name: Evolution Gone Wrong
description:
Grow out of Control and try to grow as big as possible, When you eat you will be given a new "evolution" which will change how you control your character and what possibilities you have to fend of the enemies! it will also dictate your speed and ability to turn! Make the best out of whatever situation you are given! 

Edit: To clarify, if you do not have any fins facing all directions you wont be able to

use the full WASD moveset, you have W from start and you will get A or D at random at the first bite. S can be given if you have a fin that points towards your starting character.

For the web version we did not figure out how to properly adapt the resolution and get the full game, we did a quick fix where we raised the camera to get everything on the screen, it is good enough! but for the intended experience consider downloading the windows version! 

Thank you and hope you enjoy our game! 

Credits go to 

(Me) Oskar Thölén - art and design

William Eriksson - code and design

Elliot Fogelklou - planning and design

Alice Wallberg - Music
